
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


find_package(Java REQUIRED)
find_package(SWIG REQUIRED COMPONENTS java)
include(UseSWIG)
include(UseJava)

add_swig_jni_library(catboost4j-spark-impl-cpp GEN_JAVA_FILES_LIST ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/swig_gen_java.lst SOURCES native_impl.swg)
set_property(TARGET catboost4j-spark-impl-cpp PROPERTY
  OUTPUT_NAME catboost4j-spark-impl
)
target_link_libraries(catboost4j-spark-impl-cpp PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-malloc-mimalloc
  library-cpp-dbg_output
  library-cpp-grid_creator
  library-cpp-jni
  library-cpp-json
  library-cpp-par
  cpp-threading-atomic
  cpp-threading-local_executor
  catboost-libs-cat_feature
  catboost-libs-column_description
  catboost-libs-data
  catboost-libs-helpers
  catboost-libs-logging
  catboost-libs-model
  libs-model-model_export
  catboost-libs-train_lib
  private-libs-algo
  private-libs-app_helpers
  private-libs-data_util
  private-libs-data_types
  private-libs-distributed
  private-libs-labels
  private-libs-options
  private-libs-quantized_pool
  contrib-libs-libunwind
  swig-Lib-java
  contrib-libs-jdk
)
target_link_options(catboost4j-spark-impl-cpp PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -Wl,--exclude-libs,ALL
  -Wl,-z,notext
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lcudadevrt
  -lculibos
  -lcudart_static
)
target_sources(catboost4j-spark-impl-cpp PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/calc_fstr.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/ctrs.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/dataset_rows_reader.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/data_provider_builders.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/features_layout.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/groupid.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/jni_helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/master.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/meta_info.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/model.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/model_application.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/options_helper.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/pairs.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/quantized_features_info.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/quantization.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/spark_quantized.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/string.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/target.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/vector_output.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/spark/catboost4j-spark/core/src/native_impl/worker.cpp
)
add_jar(
  catboost4j-spark-impl
  SOURCES
  @${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/swig_gen_java.lst
)
vcs_info(catboost4j-spark-impl-cpp)
